OOC: Okay, I'm sorry, but it's the truth. My characters could not co-exist =
in the same faction like that, ad then what? Make them act unrealistic? To =
keep them in character of course the Mafia would attack the Chivtrons, and =
then  who would I have die? As much as I like them, my Chivtrons would end =
up dying. It's not a threat, honest, I'm just pointing out what would reall=
y happen. Sorry if you took it as a threat...

  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturda=
y, June 30, 2001 10:24 PM
  Subject: Re: Dear owners of the Cybers...


  I=
f anyone continues to post on the subject of factions and stuff OOC, I'll h=
ave rAuq kneecap them. Now, for the (hopefully) final commant on this:

  F=
irst of all: Soulstice, that was just plain cheap. Its threats like those t=
hat make people not want people's chars in their faction. "If you do this, =
I'll kill off my chars on your side" is exactly what makes faction commande=
rs begin to rely on your chars less and less, resulting in them being ignor=
ed.

  Second of all: as Gunthers said, quit trying to predict what the All=
iance is gonna do. You're all wrong so far anyways.



  --- In nbwrpg@y...=
, "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
  > OOC: I did a poll. Want to vo=
te in it? All I'm saying is that if there is an alliance, all of my Chivtro=
ns are going to die. I didn't really want that, though...


   

  Your use=
 of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
